website_summaries.verdict: An acceptable choice if you like the unique style and mid-height size. However, they're not as streamlined and versatile as some other choices.
pros: Attractive shell base exudes a modern look
Some owners say lamps look even more beautiful in person
Height is ideal for bedrooms and family rooms
cons: The round base is bulky and consumes a bit more tabletop space than some other designs

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lamps, but not well made
customer_reviews.text: The lamps are beautiful. Pros- Came with LED bulbs (nice touch) Great size for table lamps or night stand lamps Cons-Chrome finish was coming off the neck where the bulb socket screws in. This is a pretty big issue as it would appear the finishing is not up to par. Mostly hidden by light socket base so we kept it. One of the lamps had an irregular hole where the cord exits the lamp. This is not a problem overall but my be a week spot in the shell finish. Bottom line lamps worth keeping even with flaws. Price was not unreasonable, but these are not bargain store lamps so workmanship should not be shoddy.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: I rarely write reviews but...
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this order and product was great! The packaging was excellent with attention to detail. Instructions were very laid out and easy to understand. Most of all, the lamps are beautiful! They really made a difference in my bedroom decor. I was so happy with this purchase, I will look at Safavieh lighting first before I make any lamp or lighting purchase. oh p.s., they even included lightbulbs!
customer_reviews.author: Margot

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, carefully packed, included 8,000 hr. bulbs. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of lamps for our bedroom
customer_reviews.text: These lamps were exactly what I wanted and expected when received. They are stylish and give good light. It's nice that they came in a pair, as I use them in my bedroom on the bedside tables. They came well packaged and were simple to assemble. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lori J. Gossett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! No damage in transit. Comes with 2 CFL light bulbs (60 watt equivalent).
customer_reviews.author: atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these lamps! Perfect set for my bedroom nightstands and my soft beach theme in whites and creams. Excellent design and craftsmanship. The finials are not clear, glass or crystal. They are plastic chrome coated. But they still look very nice and can be replaced easily enough. Very happy with everything about this purchase down to the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Ronan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are beautiful, and larger than I expected. They were well packaged and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: Really nice lamps
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I received these lamps. I was worried the silver tone of the lamp neck would be garish. It looks just fine and the lamps are lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Phillips

customer_reviews.title: I don't like them as much as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: I don't like them as much as I'd hoped. They're nice but not fabulous. I used the tape measure before buying but I guess it was still hard for me to visualize. I had hoped they'd be a little smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These lamps are beautiful! They brought our room together and I would ...
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are beautiful! They brought our room together and I would by them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ian O.

customer_reviews.title: they are beautiful! Perfect for my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: The lamps exceeded my expectation, they are beautiful! Perfect for my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine Gaynor

customer_reviews.title: Looks great for the beach themed bedroom I did
customer_reviews.text: Looks great for the beach themed bedroom I did. Easy to put together. The lightbulbs were included and give off a lot of nice warm light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamps!
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are so beautiful! They are exactly what I wanted and actually exceeded my expectations. They were wrapped and shipped in such a way that they arrived without breaking. They look fantastic on either side of the bed. Even the finial that's on these lamps adds a decorative touch. The base of the lamps are covered with a creamy mother of pearl shell mosaic effect. Very lovely! My husband said that they were worth every dollar we spent on them and he loves them, too! I would highly recommend these lamps. They are stunning!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanene Luster

customer_reviews.title: They are absolutely beautiful. I wish the shade were more of a ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture does not do these lamps justice. They are absolutely beautiful. I wish the shade were more of a cream rather than white. Otherwise, I am exceptionally pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Lamps
customer_reviews.text: Have had for more than a few years and just had to add a review. These are simply beautiful and look like they cost must more than I paid for them. Still very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Going Green

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely lamps, I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: I love the style and how it makes my room complete
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and how it makes my room complete. It arrived before the time that it was promised.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamps. very beautiful. They look great in our bedroom but would also look very good in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Safavieh Lighting Collection Nikki Ivory Shell 21.5-inch Table Lamp (Set of 2)
product_meta.description: The classic round gourd shape of the shell table lamp is updated with the sheen of capiz shell mosaic in pearly tones from off white to pinkish brown. Topped with a crisp Geneva white drum shade that illuminates the room. Assembly required, this lamp measures 14" x 14" x 21.5".
feature_bullets: This lamp features a white cotton shade
Perfect for a living room, bedroom, den, library, study or office
Assembly required, this lamp measures 14" x 14" x 21.5"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars29 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
